TGxV_IkVavsmt_3LW.name: Select level of night vision
TGxV_IkVavsmt_3LW.notes: 4 is fairly realistic, 9 is perfect, or use infravision

Tlk41Ig-lxtq5_e9v.name: Select an optional role in society

features.situation: on any task that utilizes sense of smell
from past victims and anyone with Empathy
to Interrogation and Intimidation rolls when you use threats or torture

t3xZarnckp6DrmzFJ.name: Sadism
t3xZarnckp6DrmzFJ.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you have an opportunity to indulge your desires and know you shouldn’t (e.g., because the prisoner is one who should be released unharmed). If you fail, you cannot restrain yourself.

features.situation: from those who become aware of your Sadism unless they are from a culture that holds life in little esteem

Tn-mrIJm2HyNHe7p6.name: Stolid mostly harmless muscle
Tn-mrIJm2HyNHe7p6.notes: Select some relevant traits (and can remove stubbornness)

features.situation: on any task that requires creativity or invention, including most rolls against Artist skill, all Engineer rolls for new inventions, and all skill rolls made to use the Gadgeteer advantage
